description:
USC is an encrypted digital currency that is stable, readily convertible and secured by the United States dollar. It has been created and is being used as one of the most advanced and
sophisticated payment instruments available.

USC is a stable cryptocurrency using blockchain technology, value pegged 1:1 with the US dollar.On USC service platform,users is able to exchange US dollar and USC any time and any way.

USC Features：1.Cross-border circulation&Connect Ecosphere；2.Multi-node decentralization Co-management；3.Embedded Economic System.
name: USC
